mapper.sql: ORDER_ID, PAYMENT, PAYMENT_TYPE, POST_FEE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PAYMENT_TIME, CONSIGN_TIME, END_TIME, CLOSE_TIME, SHIPPING_NAME, SHIPPING_CODE, USER_ID, BUYER_MESSAGE, BUYER_NICK, BUYER_RATE

o.ORDER_ID, o.PAYMENT, o.PAYMENT_TYPE, o.POST_FEE, o.STATUS, o.CREATE_TIME, o.UPDATE_TIME, o.PAYMENT_TIME, o.CONSIGN_TIME, o.END_TIME, o.CLOSE_TIME, o.SHIPPING_NAME, o.SHIPPING_CODE, o.USER_ID, o.BUYER_MESSAGE, o.BUYER_NICK, o.BUYER_RATE
mapper.select: SELECT t1.order_id as orderid , t1.payment as payment , t1.create_time as createtime , t1.post_fee as postfee , t1.UPDATE_TIME AS updatetime, t1.PAYMENT_TIME AS paymenttime, t1.CONSIGN_TIME AS consingtime, t1.END_TIME AS endtime, t1.CLOSE_TIME AS closetime, t1.SHIPPING_NAME AS shippingname, t1.SHIPPING_CODE AS shippingcode, t2.id as paytypeid , t2.describe as paytype , t3.id as orderstatusid, t3.describe as orderstatus , t5.id as orderbuyerrateid, t5.describe as orderbuyerrate , t4.username as username, t4.id as userid FROM tb_order t1 LEFT JOIN tb_workbook t2 on t1.PAYMENT_TYPE = t2.code LEFT JOIN tb_workbook t3 on t1.STATUS = t3.code LEFT JOIN tb_workbook t5 on t1.BUYER_RATE = t5.code LEFT JOIN tb_user t4 on t1.user_id = t4.id
mapper.insert: insert into TB_ORDER (ORDER_ID, PAYMENT, PAYMENT_TYPE, POST_FEE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PAYMENT_TIME, CONSIGN_TIME, END_TIME, CLOSE_TIME, SHIPPING_NAME, SHIPPING_CODE, USER_ID, BUYER_MESSAGE, BUYER_NICK, BUYER_RATE) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{postFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{consignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shippingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippingCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{buyerMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into TB_ORDER
ORDER_ID,
PAYMENT,
PAYMENT_TYPE,

PAYMENT_TIME,

BUYER_NICK,
BUYER_RATE,

mapper.update:
update TB_ORDER
PAYMENT = #{payment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYMENT_TYPE = #{paymentType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
POST_FEE = #{postFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAYMENT_TIME = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONSIGN_TIME = #{consignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CLOSE_TIME = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SHIPPING_NAME = #{shippingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIPPING_CODE = #{shippingCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUYER_MESSAGE = #{buyerMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUYER_NICK = #{buyerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUYER_RATE = #{buyerRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_ORDER set PAYMENT = #{payment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYMENT_TYPE = #{paymentType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, POST_FEE = #{postFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAYMENT_TIME = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONSIGN_TIME = #{consignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CLOSE_TIME = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SHIPPING_NAME = #{shippingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIPPING_CODE = #{shippingCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUYER_MESSAGE = #{buyerMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUYER_NICK = #{buyerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUYER_RATE = #{buyerRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
